name: Maze Roller (itch)
description:
Randomly Generated Mazes
Move by tilting your Mobile Device and find the exit, but watch out:
The Bombs are also affected by this!
Sadly as Html the tilting mechanism, which relies on the gyroscope does not work, so you have to download the file for android.


See my dark themed 3D Pc Game with similar Maze generator here:
https://tommigreenbay.itch.io/labyrinth-escape

Music used:

Menu
Level Music
